name: JMOCD V2 (Pokemon Showdown)
description:
A rewrite of another style I made for Pokémon Showdown (called "A Jumbled Mess Of Colorful Darkness). I feel like the name describes this theme pretty well. Also I don't actually know CSS all that well. I've just looked at and modified other themes for PS so much that I know what to type to get what I want. Feel free to mess with this code, change it up, and give me suggestions.

THE MEGA RAYQUAZA DRAWING IS DRAWN BY ISHMAM https://www.deviantart.com/ishmam
(also it wasn't drawn for me)

ALSO USE LIGHT MODE

Cool features in the style:
Animated Weather, Terrain, Trick Room, And Delta Stream
Cooler Looking Battles
Cooler Background And Icon (go into the code to change it into what you want)
Almost Everything Is Changed
Should Be A Lot Easier To Customize Compared To The First Version
You Can See Your Opponent's ELO Without Having To Hover Over Them

(also I didn't just brainlessly copy and paste and change; for this style I retyped almost everything)
additional_info:

Edit 2: Battles look bigger and better
Edit 3: Fixed the request help buttons
Edit 4: New scrollbars!
